price: Nela, descem os anjos e o Espírito, com a permissão de seu Senhor, encarregados de toda ordem.
arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: tanazzalu al-malāikatu wal-rūḥu fīhā bi-idh'ni rabbihim min kulli amrin
